column4: hi all, does anyone know if there any sites that i can test to see if my webcam works while on ubuntu? i know before i upgraded to 11.10, in 11.04 i couldn't get my webcam to broadcast when in a chat site called tinychat.com.
In skype in settings menu is place when u can that your webcam is working

and also im in tinychat right now and it seems im having an issue with the adobe flash setting, it won't let me select allow. and plus i can't hit close button, is there a way to automatically do this without going to the site itself?
im not talking about skype. im talking about websites that allows you to chat via webcam not programs like skype
